title: Hot and Sour BBQ Sauce
ingredients: ['1L cider vinegar', '1L white vinegar', '600g caster sugar', '250ml ketchup', '8 tablespoons crushed red chillies', '2 tablespoons black pepper', '2 tablespoons paprika', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '1 tablespoon salt', 'cayenne pepper to taste']
